divs: Sighting DetailsI set up a video camera on a tripod facing NE and began filming the cloudy sky, as I did yesterday on my patio. I only filmed for a minute because my batteries were weak. After loading the video in my computer, I watched closely. At 21-22 seconds there appeared to be an object at 0900 direction, similar to a stealth fighter. There is also a possible shock wave noise just before the craft flew by. I've attached the video. Turn up the volume to listen to the noise and observe the object at 21-22 seconds. It's gone in a millisecond.
Summary: Set up video camera towards the NE on a tripod. Began filming the sky for a few minutes.
